data.name: Out of Order
data.detailed_description:
Colours rise up from the ground, unordered, on spawner towers. You must quickly sort them and make sure they don’t go down into the wrong tower.


Once arranged correctly, you’ll be rewarded with coins. Use these coins to buy items from the shop. Items make completing levels much easier. Higher rounds yield cheaper items and more coins. How many rounds will you survive?

Features:


- Up to 4 players shared screen locally
- Endless Procedural Gameplay
- Map editor
- Create colour schemes
- Upgrade skills
- Discover Pets
- Purchase Items
- Achievements
- Stats
- Alternative keyboard layouts supported

Controls

There are several control schemes, of which you can combine in any way you like.
- AZERTY / QWERTZ keyboards are supported.
- Controls prompts for xbox / PS available (press left shoulder)
- Connect up to 4 controllers

Mouse:
RMB + LMB + Scrollwheel

Keyboard:
WASD + E + SPACE
IJKL + O + ENTER
Arrow keys + SHIFT + M

Controller:
Axis + START + A

Accessibility features

- Ability to play with only the mouse
- Ability to entirely customise the palettes used ingame
- Can disable camera shake, rapid camera movements, photosensitive mode, plus change camera speed in settings
- 4 Different volume controls to give further control to filter out any particular noises that are bothersome

data.short_description: An endless procedural collaborative sorting game for up to 4 players. Earn coins, purchase items, upgrade your skills, and even discover pets! How many rounds can you survive? Join Martin and his friends to help bring order to the forest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
